word: As the intercession of Joshua was accepted, the command was given to those that stood by, \93Take away the filthy garments from him.\94 And unto Joshua the Angel said, \93Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.\94 \93So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments.\94 Even so will all those who come to Jesus in penitence and faith receive the robe of Christ's righteousness.
